group_1.textCenter: First of all, since we have yet to come up@with any innovative measures,
our immediate task is to consolidate the Grief@Seeds we can secure from our Futatsugi,
and distribute them to everyone@as soon as possible.

group_1.textLeft: The decline in the number of Witches has slowed@down, so that might be a good place to start.

group_1.textRight: It's just a question of what to use as@a benchmark for distribution.
I would prefer it to be based on activity and results.

group_1.textLeft: But that will be hard to judge,@because it's bound to be unfair somewhere…
I fear so as well.
An imprudent method of division could potentially@lead to the collapse of the organization…

group_1.textRight: This whole situation is making me wonder…
Was it a mistake to get rid of Kyubey…?

group_1.textLeft: Oh hey, NOW you’re bitching about it.
What, you pointing fingers at Yuna@just ‘cause she started that?
As if you bitches ain't grinning just as big@during the Kyubey hunt!

group_1.textRight: Sorry, I didn't mean to blame Yuna…!

group_1.textLeft: Then, you’re all good.
Though, I do get exactly what you guys@are worried about.
Maybe we should consider an expedition.
I second that idea.

group_1.textRight: Oh, we're gonna start a war to take over@some other guys' territory?

group_1.textLeft: No, I just figured it’s a way to find an area@where there were no Magical Girls.
That’s right.@Let’s do what we can while there's still time.

group_1.textCenter: Sorry, I gotta leave for a bit…

group_1.textLeft: Right on time for lunch.@Let's have a short break.

group_1.textRight: Um, excuse me… @If I may know, what is the matter with Juri?
She seemed to be in pain, but…

group_1.textLeft: You're worried about her?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I am…

group_1.textLeft: …In that case,@would you mind coming with me for a bit?

group_1.textCenter: (This may be harder to hold in check@than I thought…)

group_1.textRight: Juri.

group_1.textLeft: Yuna…

group_1.textRight: Looks like you're reaching the point where you can't hold in your stress… your flames, any longer…

group_1.textLeft: Oh right, Yuna, you know about it…

group_1.textRight: That's why I've been so worried about you…
With Kyubey and the Witches gone,@I suppose there’s no outlet anymore…?

group_1.textLeft: What a pain in the ass.
I was born with a hot temper.
The more I suppress it, the more it suppresses me,@and the more dangerous a ticking bomb I become…

group_1.textRight: Normally I'd be the one to take care of you, but…

group_1.textLeft: …At the moment you got your hands full@with the group, I know.

group_1.textRight: But without letting off steam,@you'll go off again, won't you?

group_1.textLeft: Who knows…
I once saw the Magical Girl world as@a place to release my stress…
As a god-given boxing ring…

group_1.textRight: And if you return to that ring,@everything you've built so far will be for nothing.

group_1.textLeft: Which is exactly why I'm beating my head against@the wall AALLLL by myself! Get it?!

group_1.textRight: And that’s why you'll be facing her:@to blow off some of those pent-up flames.

group_1.textLeft: Huh…?

group_1.textRight: Oh, um, I heard what you said…!

group_1.textLeft: You are…

group_1.textRight: You have seemed a little off for a while now—@it was concerning me!

group_1.textLeft: Anyone but Yuna would just die.@Forget it.

group_1.textRight: Still, within Torayamachi, this girl has a higher@level of capability than Sakuya.
She might be a bit shy,@and oftens hides behind other girls,
but when it comes to fighting spirit,@she’s got my seal of approval.

group_1.textLeft: If that’s so, she may actually do better@than my Ryuugasaki girls…
Alright, I’ll have a go with you.@Come at me!

group_1.textRight: Yes…!
